QuestData.Title: Ease of Passage
QuestData.Description:
Korthia is ripe with opportunity. Look at all of these intriguing objects.
In anticipation of such wonders, I have come prepared. Let us find a suitable location and establish a more permanent connection between this place and my refuge.
Our work together is not yet finished.
QuestData.LogDescription: Establish a connection between Korthia and Ve'nari's Refuge.
QuestData.RewardText:
A worthwhile trip that has opened so many possibilities.
<Ve'nari digs through the heavy bag and pulls out a few unusual objects.>
